qna_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the String concat node in klinter_nodes?
qna_pairs.answer: The String concat node is used for adding strings together, primarily in creating prompts.

qna_pairs.question: What does the Filter node in klinter_nodes do?
qna_pairs.answer: The Filter node in klinter_nodes is a proof of concept (POC) of a bad words list filtering system. It replaces bad words found in a prompt with good ones.

qna_pairs.question: Can you describe the functionality of the Size selector node in klinter_nodes?
qna_pairs.answer: The Size selector node is used in almost all workflows. It calls for sizes from an external list. It is currently under development and will feature an aspect ratio chooser, a custom size option, and a height/width single size calculator.

qna_pairs.question: What is the current status of the PresentString node in klinter_nodes?
qna_pairs.answer: The PresentString node in klinter_nodes is not in use at the moment. It is currently marked as n/a.
